data.name: Warframe: Prime Vault – Zephyr Prime Accessories
data.detailed_description:
The Prime Vault is now open! For a limited time, you can purchase this pack and gain instant access to Vaulted Prime Accessories and more! Get them before they retire and return to the Vault!

ZEPHYR PRIME ACCESSORIES
  • 200 Platinum
  • Commodore Prime Suit
  • Tibor Prime Armor
  • Tibor Prime Gene-Masking Kit

BONUS: Kavat Incubator Segment and Kavat Starter Kit
data.about_the_game:
The Prime Vault is now open! For a limited time, you can purchase this pack and gain instant access to Vaulted Prime Accessories and more! Get them before they retire and return to the Vault!

ZEPHYR PRIME ACCESSORIES
  • 200 Platinum

BONUS: Kavat Incubator Segment and Kavat Starter Kit
data.short_description: Instantly unlock Prime Accessories and discounted Platinum!
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows 7 64-Bit (32-bit not supported)
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo e6400 or AMD Athlon x64 4000+
  • Video:DirectX 11+ capable Graphics Card
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Storage:35 GB available HD space
  • Internet:Broadband Internet Connection Required

Note: There is no Mac or Linux client currently available.
